Room.Name: Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You find yourself in a long hallway heading north and ending with a closed and locked door to the south. The air is very stale, but breathable.
Room.LongDescription: The hallway is finely crafted out of the rock and ice into square edges which makes walking around very easy. The long hallway continues as far north as you can see. To the south is a strange door seemingly in the middle of nowhere. It appears to be locked, but shouldn't be too hard to pick.
